title: Talon Chroma Pack
body:
#No options but a white-clothed version of Talon.
[](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Talon_0.jpg)
http://www.letstalkvideogames.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/Assassins-creed-Ezio-by-sXeven.jpg

#Highest purchase rate on the store.

replies.body:
Actually, it's already out on PBE. Here's the splash art for it

http://imgur.com/1xeRH9d
Buy the SSW one man. I love my SSW {{champion:412}} and would buy {{champion:91}} 's if I could right now what with the rework looking fun.
Pretty sure it's completely unavailable now  :(
I would say I agree, but they're all pretty good now in pbe. They all have their own designs for the blades on pbe now!

I have made 2 post already asking if he is getting a chroma, the first post question was answered though when riot said they will be focusing chroma as currently for skins and not base ones though... GIVE ME WHITE TALON SKIN RITO, I really didnt want to get the ssw one though

http://orig00.deviantart.net/8126/f/2015/240/2/b/assassin_s_creed_hd_wallpaper_5_by_tead_by_santap555-d97fs55.jpg

Whew boy, this would one hell of a chroma pack
